#358 0' 2.9"
17.64 lbs. 		Ore Pokémon Glimmet's toxic mineral crystals look just like flower petals. This Pokémon scatters poisonous powder like pollen to protect itself.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Toxic Debris 7 Scatters Toxic Spikes on the opposing side when it takes damage from physical moves.
10 Poison Touch 6 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
25 Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
40 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
55 Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
70 Arena Lock 9 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
85 Corrosion 7 The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
100 Prism Armor 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 12 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 45 Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
Disc 53 Arena Lock 9 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
Disc 58 Prism Armor 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Adaptability 8 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Arena Trap 10 Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.
Cecity -3 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Corrosion 7 The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
Forewarn 3 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
Guts 6 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Merciless 6 The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Poison Point 5 Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
Poison Touch 6 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
Sand Spit 5 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Serene Grace 9 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Shell Armor 2 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Skill Link 8 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Sludge Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in acid rain.
Stench 3 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Tinted Lens 7 The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
Toxic Debris 7 Scatters Toxic Spikes on the opposing side when it takes damage from physical moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unstable Isotope 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats under Gravity.
Weak Bones -4 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
